title: Stochastic Mfg&Serv Sys
description: Methods for describing stochastic movements of material in manufacturing facilities, supply chain, and equipment maintenance networks. Includes analysis of congestion, delays, and inventory ordering policies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 2027 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3235 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3236 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
